title: System Access
description: Represents specific system access granted to 1 or more people at DOGE

id.description: A specific identifier for this access

name.description: Who of the DOGE crew was granted access

alias.description: If access was granted to an alias. This will overwrite the name field if the Alias is know

agency.description: For SSP/SaaS systems, the specific agency this access was granted at

type.description: The maximum type of access granted

date_requested.description: The date access was first requested (if known and predates granting)

ao_name.description: If known, who granted the access

ao_type.description: The type of the granting position

bypassed.description: What procedures were skipped / staff were sidelined to provide such access

date_nte.description: The date for which access grant is not to exceed. Also used for cases like court declarations where exact revocation hasn't been given

last_accessed.description: If known, the last day the person accessed the system

never_accessed.description: True if the system was reportedly never accessed

source.description: One or more links to sources about the system granting
